techniques.name: Add Context
techniques.description: Providing background information helps the model understand the broader picture and tailor its response.
techniques.example_enhancement: Instead of 'Write a post', try 'As a marketing manager, write a LinkedIn post for developers about our new API.'

techniques.name: Specify Format
techniques.description: Explicitly stating the desired output format reduces ambiguity and post-processing needs.
checklist: Define the structure (e.g., list, essay, code)
Mention file formats if applicable (JSON, Markdown)
techniques.example_enhancement: Add 'Output the result as a JSON object with keys: title, summary, tags.'

techniques.name: Provide Examples (Few-Shot)
techniques.description: Giving examples of input-output pairs significantly improves performance on complex tasks.
checklist: Include at least one clear example
Ensure examples match the desired format

techniques.name: Clarify Constraints
techniques.description: Setting boundaries helps the model avoid unwanted behaviors or outputs.
techniques.example_enhancement: Add 'Do not use technical jargon. Keep sentences under 20 words.'

techniques.name: Chain of Thought
techniques.description: Encouraging the model to think step-by-step improves reasoning capabilities.
checklist: Ask the model to explain its reasoning
Use phrases like 'Let's think step by step'
techniques.example_enhancement: Add 'First, outline the logic, then write the code. Explain your decision for each function.'

techniques.name: Add Evaluation Criteria
techniques.description: Telling the model how it will be evaluated helps it optimize for those metrics.
techniques.example_enhancement: Add 'The response should be judged on clarity, brevity, and witty tone.'
